Text:
A BangBros film.

Lexi Belle, looking mighty fine, plays with herself for the camera for a while, and then gives a handjob to some guy who's shaven off all his pubes.  She strokes the guy for nearly 12 minutes of the film... IMO, the guy's probably gay; if a woman that pretty started wanking me that expertly, I'd probably only last around 3 minutes... lol.
